folder: Richmond Terrace & Houseman Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
2640 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.W. corner of Houseman Avenue. Beers's map of 1874, and Robinson's maps of 1898 and 1907 show it to have been the Henry Miller house.

September 28, 1924.

Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Houseman Avenue
